mapper.select: SELECT R.COM_NO , LIKE_COUNT , C.USER_NO , COM_TITLE , SALAD_NAME , SALAD_MATERIAL , SALAD_SAUCE , SALAD_COMMENT , REPORT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , UPLOAD_DATE , REF_CNO FROM(SELECT COM_NO, LIKE_COUNT FROM(SELECT COM_NO, COUNT(COM_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM "LIKE" GROUP BY COM_NO ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3) R LEFT JOIN COMMUNITY C ON(C.COM_NO = R.COM_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_CNO = C.COM_NO) WHERE C.COM_NO = R.COM_NO AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COM_NO , C.USER_NO , COM_TITLE , SALAD_NAME , SALAD_MATERIAL , SALAD_SAUCE , SALAD_COMMENT , REPORT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , UPLOAD_DATE , REF_CNO FROM COMMUNITY C LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(A.REF_CNO = C.COM_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "UPLOAD_DATE" , REF_CNO FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_CNO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY FILE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT( FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , UPLOAD_DATE , REF_CNO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATNO.NEXTVAL , #{originName} , #{changeName} , SYSDATE , SEQ_CMNO.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT COM_NO , C.USER_NO , USER_ID , COM_TITLE , SALAD_NAME , SALAD_MATERIAL , SALAD_SAUCE , SALAD_COMMENT , REPORT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" , MODIFY_DATE , FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , UPLOAD_DATE , REF_CNO FROM COMMUNITY C LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(A.REF_CNO = C.COM_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' AND COM_NO = #{cno}

SELECT REPLY_NO , USER_ID , REF_COM_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , REPORT , CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_COM_NO = #{refComNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT DISTINCT L.COM_NO, NVL(MY_LIKE, 'N') MY_LIKE, NVL(LIKE_COUNT, 0)LIKE_COUNT FROM "LIKE" L LEFT JOIN (SELECT LIKE_NO, CASE WHEN USER_NO = #{userNo} AND COM_NO = #{comNo} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MY_LIKE FROM "LIKE" WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}) M ON(COM_NO = COM_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COM_NO, COUNT(LIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM "LIKE" GROUP BY COM_NO) C ON (L.COM_NO = C.COM_NO) WHERE L.COM_NO = #{comNo}

SELECT COM_NO , C.USER_NO , COM_TITLE , SALAD_NAME , SALAD_MATERIAL , SALAD_SAUCE , SALAD_COMMENT , REPORT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM COMMUNITY C LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(A.REF_CNO = C.COM_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND C.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY COM_NO DESC

SELECT C.COM_NO , C.USER_NO , R.USER_NO "REPORT_USER_NO" , SUBSTR(M.USER_ID, 1, 3) || LPAD('*',LENGTH(M.USER_ID)-3, '*') USER_ID , COM_TITLE , SALAD_NAME , SALAD_MATERIAL , SALAD_SAUCE , SALAD_COMMENT , "REPORT" , TO_CHAR(C.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" , MODIFY_DATE , FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , UPLOAD_DATE , REF_CNO FROM COMMUNITY C LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(A.REF_CNO = C.COM_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN "REPORT" R ON(C.COM_NO = R.REPORT_COM) WHERE COM_NO = #{reportCom} AND REPORT_REP = 0 AND R.USER_NO = #{reportUserNo}

SELECT C.COM_NO , C.USER_NO , R.USER_NO "REPORT_USER_NO" , SUBSTR(M.USER_ID, 1, 3) || LPAD('*',LENGTH(M.USER_ID)-3, '*') USER_ID , COM_TITLE , SALAD_NAME , SALAD_MATERIAL , SALAD_SAUCE , SALAD_COMMENT , "REPORT" , TO_CHAR(C.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" , MODIFY_DATE , FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , UPLOAD_DATE , REF_CNO FROM COMMUNITY C LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(A.REF_CNO = C.COM_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN "REPORT" R ON(C.COM_NO = R.REPORT_COM) WHERE COM_NO = #{reportCom} AND REPORT_REP != 0 AND R.USER_NO = #{reportUserNo}
